cost.heading: "OK, so how much does it cost?"
cost.body: It depends and varies based on requirements. I provide free consultancy to learn what you want to accomplish and provide sensible options to make it happen. Then you get a quote based on the information I learn from this discovery phase. I wish it was easier, but making up numbers serves nobody and would be misleading.
